resources.string: Made by Tobias Estefors for cource "Utveckling av mobila applikationer" at Ume√• University\nSprites in this application are not my own and is made by Boo at sprite-resources and from www.boogleech.com

Enemies will spawn every second so touch where you want to shoot.
 Powerups will be droped and there is three of them :
 Shield wich gives you 50% less damage taken, swords wich gives you multitarget shooting and skull wich damages you for 10 damage.
 You lose when your healthbar is empty
